title: Remove Dashboard tab and route from navigation

requirements.summary: Remove the Dashboard tab UI element and its associated route from the navigation bar in App.tsx so users cannot access DashboardView.tsx from the tab navigation
acceptanceCriteria: The Dashboard tab is no longer visible in the app's tab navigation bar
The route to DashboardView.tsx is removed from the routing configuration in App.tsx
Users cannot navigate to the Dashboard screen from any tab in the UI
All other tabs (Info, New Entry, Stats, History) remain functional and unchanged

file_operations.description: Remove the Dashboard tab from the tab navigation array and its corresponding route configuration. Remove any imports related to DashboardView.tsx. Ensure the remaining four tabs (Info, New Entry, Stats, History) maintain their functionality and the default active tab is set appropriately (e.g., to 'info' if Dashboard was previously default).
